title.rendered: Plant and Safety Appoints Daniel Marson as Regional Director – North

content.rendered:
Plant and Safety Appoints Daniel Marson as Regional Director - North

Plant and Safety has appointed Daniel Marson as the Regional Director for its Northern Region, which includes Scotland, Northern Ireland, and Northern England (North West and North East). Daniel Marson joins the business with a Marine Engineering background, having spent 8+ years in the Royal Navy followed by 10+ years working for Lloyds British in various roles, from Engineer through to Regional Manager. 

Ryan White, Managing Director, said the following 

“Having spent several years working with Daniel at Lloyds British, I’m incredibly proud and excited to see him join our team. He brings a wealth of industry knowledge and experience and shares our vision of providing industry-leading Testing, Inspection, Certification, and Training Services. I would like to give him a warm welcome to the team and wish him all the best in his new role.”

Plant and Safety Limited are a national provider of Testing, Inspection, Certification, and Training Services. We strive to deliver the best customer service and ensure that our customer’s people and their equipment remain both safe and compliant. 

Contact Details

T: 0330 113 7920

E: sales@plantandsafety.co.uk

Plant and Safety Ltd, Birmingham Road, Shenstone, Staffordshire, WS14 0LB

About Plant and Safety Limited

Plant and Safety Limited are the UK trading business for the LB International Group, which operates from the Middle East, and Africa. Plant and Safety are national providers of Inspection, Testing, Certification, and Training Services on equipment within the work place including lifting equipment, work equipment, plant equipment, and access equipment. Plant and Safety Limited are an NPORS Approved and Accredited Training Provider. As an NPORS approved training provider, NPORS course attendees will be issued with an NPORS Training Certificate.
